plot: Two burglars attempt to rob a wealthy house, but when a woman unexpectedly arrives home, she recognizes one of the criminals and now the two partners are pitted against each other.
title: Oblivion
plot_es: Two burglars attempt to rob a wealthy house, but when a woman unexpectedly arrives home, she recognizes one of the criminals and now the two partners are pitted against each other.
plot_en: Two burglars attempt to rob a wealthy house, but when a woman unexpectedly arrives home, she recognizes one of the criminals and now the two partners are pitted against each other.
